body: On the mc zone server, I had bought kits for nexus. I want to redeem my kits in xp's!

title: reedem kits

replies.body:
Wow, you were almost a year gone and now you want to redeem your kits? 
The mczone is gone, now it's avicus. It changed..

replies.body: You can redeem kits that you bought in MCZone on Avicus.... I do not know how but I would assume you should contact IvyCode, or AviGill.
